donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
The overall goal of the project is to "Halt the spread of HIV with a special emphasis on young people 1524" in Belize. It proposes to address key gaps in the national response to HIV/AIDS, and focus specifically on the most at-risk groups in Belize. 
This project is structured with both, an HIV and a Health Systems Strengthening (HSS) component. The HIV proposal includes the following four main Objectives: 1) To reduce the sexual transmission of HIV among young people, MSM and FSW; 2) To improve the quality of life of PLWHA and children infected and affected by HIV & AIDS; 3) To improve the coverage and quality of the continuum of care for HIV infected and affected populations through enhanced ART treatment; 4) To enhance the skill sets of the human resources at all levels in the national response to HIV and AIDS. 
The HSS component will focus on: i) Further development of the BHIS to enhance M&E and project management; ii) enhancing the medical laboratory system; and iii) further improving procurement and supply management systems.

donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: The PMU component of the project covers the overall management of the implementation of the Global Fund Round 9 HIV Project.  This includes human, financial, procurement and monitoring & evaluation support to the project.
